short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: IPRoyal Proxy Manager allows you to easily control all your proxies in your Browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The IPRoyal Proxy Manager is your ultimate tool for seamless proxy configuration and management in Google Chrome. This free extension empowers you to control all your proxies and proxy profiles effortlessly, with no need to adjust your system settings.

Key features:
- Add, configure, and manage proxies directly within the extension
- Log in to IPRoyal to access and configure residential proxies
- Select country, state, city, protocol, rotation, and all other options
- View your remaining residential proxy traffic in real time
- Switch between proxies instantly and set favorites for quick access
- Search through your configured proxies for effortless management

With the full functionality of the IPRoyal dashboard at your fingertips, the IPRoyal Proxy Manager is your one-stop solution for proxy configuration and control. Avoid geo-restrictions, blocks, and bans while enjoying truly unrestricted internet access - all with just a few clicks.
